violations.description: Ensure aria-hidden elements are not focusable nor contain focusable elements
violations.help: ARIA hidden element must not be focusable or contain focusable elements

nodes.html: <dialog aria-hidden="true" class="ho hp hq hr ac hs ht hu hv ba by hw hx hy hz i0 i1 i2 i3 b c i4 i5 gd i6 m a2 a3 a4 a5 o hn" style="transform: translateX(-100%);">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  Focusable content should be disabled or be removed from the DOM
  Focusable content should have tabindex="-1" or be removed from the DOM
